M

. HOLD 3 -          14,553.08                                             14,000.00
. HOLD 4 -          15,333.27                                             14,700.00
. HOLD 5 -          13,404.64                                             12,500.00

. LIGHT BALLAST CONDITION: 14.78 M (Fore 5.10 M, Aft 6.62 m draft)

- STEEL WEATHER-TIGHT DOUBLE SKIN FOLDING TYPE WITH FLAT TOP.
- NUMBER OF GEAR/GRABS AND ITS CAPACITY (WT/CBM):
. 4 SINGLE DECK CRANES, 30 MT SWL EACH, TYPE SS300200-280B, WMMP, CHINA.
. BETWEEN HOLDS NO 1-2, 2-3, 3-4, 4-5 FITTED ON CENTER LINE
. FULL CYCLE WITH MAX PERMISSIBLE LOAD 30 MT, WORKING RADIUS MAX - 28 M /
MIN 3.4 M / LUFFING TIME ABT 71 SEC. SLEWING SPEED 0.4 RPM; HOISTING
SPEED: 30 MT X 20 M/MIN /GRAB 24 MT X 20M/MIN
. CRANE OUTREACH BEYOND SHIP SIDE 11.85 M
- 4 PS 6-12m3/24T REMOTE CONTROL GRAB (CAPACITY 6-12 M3 BY KICK OUT PLATE)
. TARE 9500KG, SWL 14.5 MT (WHEN CRANES WORK ON GRAB DUTY
. THE TOTAL WEIGHT OF GRAB+CARGO NOT TO EXCEED 24 MT),
. SUITABLE FOR BULK CARGO WITH DENSITY   1.0-2.5 t/m3
. DIMENSION HATCHES (M): NO.1 - 18.86 X 18.26, NO.2,3,4,5 - 21.32 X 18.26
- DIMENSION HOLDS (M) LENGTH X BREADTH X HEIGHT TT TO TOP HATCHCOAMINGS:
. HOLD 1 - 27.88 X 32.26 X 18.70
. HOLD 2 - 31.16 X 32.26 X 18.50
. HOLD 3 - 29.52 X 32.26 X 18.50
. HOLD 4 - 31.16 X 32.26 X 18.50
. HOLD 5 - 29.52 X 32.26 X 18.50
. FLAT TANKTOP DIMENSIONS (M) B X L   BREADTH FORE/AFT IN:
. HOLD 1 10.71/23.82X27.88   -    535.11 M2
. HOLD 2          23.82X28.70   -    683.75 M2
. HOLD 3          23.82X27.06   -    644.68 M2
. HOLD 4          23.82X28.70   -    683.75 M2
. HOLD 5   23.82/9.06X29.52   -    481.28 M2
. TOTAL TANK   TOP                - 3,028.57 M2
- STRENGTH (PERMISSIBLE LOADS), MT/M2 OF:
. TANKTOPS: HOLD 1,3,5 - 25 MT/SQ.M   HOLD 2,4 - 20 MT/SQ.M
. ABOVE TANKTOP STRENGTH APPLICABLE FOR UNIFORM/HOMOGENEOUS
. BULK CARGOES OR FLAT BASE BREAKBULK CGOES.
. ALTERNATE HOLDS LOADING: 1-3-5. DECK/H.COVERS LOADING NOT PERMITTED.
SPEED/DAILY CONSUMPTION IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS DEFINED AS MAXIMUM
BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS STATE 3, NO SWELL NOR ADVERSE CURRENT
IFO GRADE: VLSFO (MAX 0.5% S) AS PER ISO 8217:2017(E) NOT TO CONTAIN
AUTOMOTIVE LUBOIL OR OTHER WASTE CHEMICALS OR CATALYTIC FINES (Si+Al).
LSMGO (MAX 0.1% S) ISO 8217:2017(E).
ABOUT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.00 MT VLSFO LADEN
ABOUT 13.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 27.00 MT VLSFO LADEN
ABOUT 13.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.00 MT VLSFO BALLAST
PLUS AUXILIARY ENGINES ABOUT 2.50 MT VLSFO AT SEA.
IN PORT: VLSFO ABT 2.95 MT IDLE, ABT 4.95 MT WORKING,
BOTH AT SEA AND IN PORT ALWAYS ADD 0.2 MT/DAY LSMGO.
THE VESSEL MAY BURN LSMGO WHEN MANOEUVRING, IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS,
RESTRICTED AREAS, RIVERS, WHEN ENTERING/LEAVING THE PORTS.
all details "ABOUT" given in good faith but without guarantee
+
PLEASE PROPOSE
